alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 2:33PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weber...south central Box Elder...northwestern Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 233 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Delle, or 13 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Hat Island and Antelope Island State Park. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 72 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys
